item.description:
Hi, everyone. Andrew here. Mama Teresa's has good seating, lots of food, and is only a block or two away from Tazza. (Say you went to Tazza by accident. To meet us, start with Tazza to your right--on the right side of Westminster Street--then walk a block and a half on Westminster toward the river, and you'll see Mama Teresa's on your left.)

PS [from Chris]: I've added an OPTIONAL $1 donation starting with this month's event. It costs about $15 per month to run the group website - if you find value in these meetups and would like to help out please donate, however it is NOT a prerequisite for attending our events. You can submit your donation via PayPal or to me directly at March's meetup event.

group.name: Providence Web Development Lunch Hour Meetup Group

item.name: Providence Web Development Lunch Hour July Meetup
